title: Basic Select
description: Retrieve name and salary from Employees table

title: Filter by Department
description: Select all employees working in department 3

title: Join employees with departments
description: Displays employee name with their department name
sql: SELECT e.name, d.department_name FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Departments d ON e.department_id = d.id;

title: Count employees per department
description: Group employees based on their department and count total
sql: SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Employees GROUP BY department_id;
